subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Wladimir Klitschko defended his I.B.F. heavyweight crown by stopping Hasim Rahman in the seventh round in Mannheim, Germany. Klitschko, who has not lost in more than four years, hit the shorter Rahman at will throughout.
snippet: Wladimir Klitschko defended his I.B.F. heavyweight crown by stopping Hasim Rahman in the seventh round in Mannheim, Germany. Klitschko, who has not lost in more than four years, hit the shorter Rahman at will throughout.
